SOAP-ENV:Fault.faultstring: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling}systemFault; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPJBI-6021: Caught exception when invoking two way external webservice</jbi:part></jbi:message>. detail.detailText: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling}systemFault; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPJBI-6021: Caught exception when invoking two way external webservice</jbi:part></jbi:message>.
